amendment.description: To eliminate methyl tertiary butyl ether from the United States fuel supply, to increase production and use of renewable fuel, and to increase the Nation's energy independence.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 539 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 539 proposed by Senator Frist. (consideration: CR S5983) To eliminate methyl tertiary butyl ether from the United States fuel supply, to increase production and use of renewable fuel, and to increase the Nation's energy independence.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 539 proposed by Senator Frist.
